summary: Comprehensive testing of Long-form Videos (YouTube) Kanban and Attract (Video Ideas) features completed. All backend APIs working correctly (17/17 tests passed). Frontend Kanban boards fully functional with create, edit, status change, and delete operations verified.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/youtube/videos returns videos list and counts
Backend: POST /api/youtube/videos creates new video project
Backend: PUT /api/youtube/videos/{id} updates video status and fields
Backend: DELETE /api/youtube/videos/{id} deletes video
Backend: Video status progression through all 6 statuses (idea→scripting→filming→editing→review→published)
Backend: GET /api/attract/ideas returns ideas list and counts
Backend: POST /api/attract/ideas creates new video idea
Backend: PUT /api/attract/ideas/{id} updates idea status and fields
Backend: DELETE /api/attract/ideas/{id} deletes idea
Backend: Idea status progression through all 5 statuses (idea→scripting→filming→editing→published)
Backend: GET /api/attract/trending returns trending videos (MOCKED - requires Apify subscription)
Frontend: Long-form Videos page loads with 6-column Kanban board
Frontend: All Kanban columns visible (Ideas, Scripting, Filming, Editing, Review, Published)
Frontend: New Video Project button opens dialog with all fields
Frontend: Create video project works and card appears in Kanban
Frontend: Click on video card opens edit dialog with all fields
Frontend: Status change via dropdown moves card to correct column
Frontend: Save Changes updates video and shows success toast
Frontend: Delete video removes card from Kanban
Frontend: Attract page loads with TikTok Trends 'Coming Soon' section
Frontend: Video Ideas Kanban visible with 5 columns
Frontend: New Video Idea button opens dialog
Frontend: Create idea works and card appears in Kanban
Frontend: Edit and delete idea functionality works
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_youtube_attract.py - Created comprehensive test suite for YouTube and Attract APIs
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during testing (TEST_ prefixed items)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Long-form Videos Kanban at /nurture/long-form-videos with 6 statuses (idea, scripting, filming, editing, review, published). Attract page at /prospect/1-2-1-viral-videos with TikTok Trends 'Coming Soon' section (MOCKED - requires Apify subscription) and Video Ideas Kanban with 5 statuses. All CRUD operations working for both features.

tiktok_trending.reason: TikTok trending videos integration requires paid Apify actor subscription
tiktok_trending.mock_behavior: Returns sample trending videos data for demo purposes

long_form_videos_kanban.details: 6-column Kanban board (Ideas, Scripting, Filming, Editing, Review, Published) with full CRUD operations

attract_tiktok_trends.details: Shows 'Coming Soon' badge with link to enable Apify TikTok actor subscription

attract_video_ideas_kanban.details: 5-column Kanban board (Ideas, Scripting, Filming, Editing, Published) with full CRUD operations
